supply.supply_status: Strained - Division recently retreated from Sidi Barrani to Bardia (December 1940). Supply lines from Tripoli stretched (1,800+ km). Fuel deliveries irregular, ammunition stocks adequate for defensive operations but declining. Water from Bardia wells adequate. Food supplies moderate (15-20 days). No indication of imminent collapse but sustainability questionable for extended operations. Supply situation will deteriorate rapidly once British besiege Bardia.
